price: Na ili wajue wanao jadiliana katika Ishara zetu kwamba hawana pahala pa kukimbilia.
arabic: وَيَعۡلَمَ ٱلَّذِينَ يُجَٰدِلُونَ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِنَا مَا لَهُم مِّن مَّحِيصٖ
footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu, Subhanahu, hufanya hayo ili Waumini wapate kuzingatia, na wajue wale wanao zirudi Ishara zake kwa upotovu kwamba wao wamo katika mkono wake, wala hawana pa kuikimbia adhabu yake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wayaʿlama alladhīna yujādilūna fī āyātinā mā lahum min maḥīṣin
